alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 24 at 6:11AM AKDT until March 27 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. Very low visibility possible. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow is expected to develop early Saturday afternoon and continue through Sunday night. Strong winds on Saturday afternoon and and Saturday night could cause blizzard conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
